starters.description: Everything but the bread! Turn any one of your favourite sandwiches into a salad. Add crunch to your meal with chopped lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, cucumbers and much more!
Classic caesar salad served with ranch and crunchy croutons.

mains.description: Are you a meat-lover? Then you'll love our Cold Cut Combo! One bite into these delicious deli meats, topped with crisp vegetables and served on your choice of bread and you'll be addicted.
Zesty meatballs, covered with marinara sauce, and served on your choice of bread. Every bite is simply sensational! Get it toasted for even more great taste.

mains.dishName: Footlong Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki Sub
mains.description: Our Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki is stuffed with teriyaki glazed chicken strips and topped with our own fat free Sweet Onion sauce.

desserts.description: Classic chocolate chip cookie. Don't say we didn't warn you, our cookies are irresistible.
Irresistible white chocolate macademia nut cookie. Don't say we didn't warn you, our cookies are irresistible.
